source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Location Code],
	[ECOM],
	[Last Modified On],
	'10001' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Cr_Memo Header]
where year([Posting Date]) >=2020
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[No_],
	[Sell-to Customer No_],
	[Bill-to Customer No_],
	[Posting Date],
	[Shipment Date],
	[Location Code],
	[ECOM],
	[Last Modified On],
	'10002' as Site_Code

select a.* from [dbo].[Sales_Cr_Memo_Header] a left join [dbo].[watermarkscmh] b on a.Site_Code = b.Site_Code 
where a.[Posting Date] > b.Last_Modified_On

activities.name: get_all_files_lastmodified
activities.description: get all files lastmodified and use latest file to dump in a temp csv filr.
